name: Snake Eyes (anxietywithfries)
description:
GMTK 2022 Game Jam: Roll of the Dice

Click matching pairs of dice to clear them. Press R with one die selected to add more dice. If you match a pair of ones you get to delete one die from the screen. Clear the screen to win!

Thank you for playing, I hope you enjoyed this and all the other entries :D

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Font: Yoster Island by codeman38 (www.zone38.net)

Software Used:

  • Unity
  • Pixel Studio (iOS)
